HeroSection.description: The Caribbean Cybersecurity Agency (ACCYB) is the leading inter-regional player in cybersecurity for the benefit of public and private organizations in French American territories.

majorActivities.title: Our major activities
majorActivities.description1: Consolidate and analyze information representative of the uses and cyber maturity of each territory with a view to adopting strategies adapted to our realities.
majorActivities.description2: Support businesses and communities in an initial cyber maturity assessment process.
majorActivities.description3: Promote awareness and acculturation to the principle of cybersecurity among the general public.
majorActivities.description4: Assistance center for victims of cyberattacks via CSIRT-ATLANTIC.
majorActivities.description5: Monitoring of the internet exposure area of ​​our members' sensitive services.
majorActivities.description6: Broadcast safety alerts reporting immediate danger.

DiscoverTheACCYB.HeroSectionDesciption: Faced with the challenges posed by digital transformation, the Caribbean Agency for Cybersecurity (ACCYB)'s mission is to promote, by all means, knowledge sharing between the scientific, economic, private and public spheres. The agency thus aims to bring about long-term solutions relating to cybersecurity, safety and resilience of the French territories of America and the Caribbean area.

OurMission.OurMissionSubDescription1: Organize cyber governance in our territories and promote the regulations in force and share the realities of our territories.
OurMission.OurMissionSubDescription2: Identify and analyze the realities of our territories, consolidate shareable data within the community that can enrich reflection.
OurMission.OurMissionSubDescription3: Support all stakeholders towards digital trust and promote cybersecurity awareness and training actions.
OurMission.OurMissionSubDescription4: Contribute to the strategic thinking of public and private institutions on issues related to cybersecurity and the organization of a trusted local ecosystem, responding to the challenges of our territories.
OurMission.OurMissionSubDescription5: Process requests for assistance from mid-sized players and put you in touch with local partners.
